hypothesis_content.title: ETF Flow Divergence as Leading Indicator for BTC Reversals
hypothesis_content.statement: When daily BTC ETF net flows diverge from BTC price direction by >$200M (outflows on green days or inflows on red days), price will reverse within 48 hours with 70% accuracy during NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: ETF flows represent institutional 'real money' that often leads retail sentiment. The liquidity reset creates conditions where this divergence becomes more predictive as market structure is fragile.
entry_conditions: Daily ETF net flows >$200M opposite to BTC daily return direction
BTC 4h chart shows exhaustion pattern (doji at range extremes)
Funding rates neutral (<|0.001|) to avoid crowded positioning

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% move in direction opposite to original trend
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price continues 3% in original trend direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Success rate < 60% over 20 consecutive signals in NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes.
